sentences: The Mayflower was the ship that transported the first English Separatists, known today as the Pilgrims, from Plymouth to the New World in 1620. There were 102 passengers, and the crew is <<||>> to have been about 30, but the <<||>> number is unknown. This voyage has become an <<||>> story in some of the earliest <<||>> American history, with its story of death and of survival in the <<||>> New England winter environment. The culmination of the voyage in the signing of the Mayflower Compact was an event which established a <<||>> of democracy, with each member contributing to the <<||>> of the community. The Pilgrim ship Mayflower has a famous place in American history as a symbol of early European colonization of the future United States. The main record for the voyage of the Mayflower and the <<||>> of the Plymouth Colony comes from the letters and journal of William Bradford, who was a <<||>> and later the governor of the colony. Via Wikipedia.org.
name: Mayflower
